availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John H. Byassee (Hickman Co. farmer & miller)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Elvira Catherine Byassee. Father of John Byassee, Isaac Byassee, Julia Byassee, Dolla Byassee, James Byassee, Peter Byassee, Mary Byassee, William Byassee, and Catherine Byassee. Farmer in Clinton, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Clinton District, p. 72-73.
